name: FreeSpace (Eyrie Interactive)
description:
Welcome to the FreeSpace

Dive into the world of FreeSpace, an expanding open world sandbox filled with tons of weapons, items, places to explore, and the best bit... your friends!

  • Goof around in a large open world with your friends online!
  • Use a ton of different weapons and items to your advantage (or disadvantage). (Coming Soon)
  • Customize your character with heaps of different colours and accessories.  
  • Discover all kinds of secrets hidden around the map! 

Looking for frequent developer updates, community interaction and direct player-to-developer suggestions and support? Look no further than the FreeSpace Discord. Join a great community of people and follow along with this development journey!

  • v0.1 - The Beginning
    • Game Launch
    • Multiplayer
    • Character Customization
    • Preview Map
  • v0.2 - Oh The Places You'll Go...
    • Major Map Expansion Update
    • Proximity Voice Chat
    • Tons of secrets to find
  • v0.3 - Lock & Load
    • Tons of weapons come to the FreeSpace...
    • More map expansion
  • v0.4 - ???
